section.55: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:Three things follow the bier of a dead man. Two of them come back and one is left with him: the members of his family, wealth and his good deeds. The members of his family and wealth come back and the deeds alone are left with him
